full_threads.body:
Hi Rica, Thanks for the update! They look good. We have 2 more requests -
  • The 2 blocks have somehow been removed from the new homepage (https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/home-new/) can we please add them back? "Flexible, customisable cover" and "Travel with purpose" blocks
  • Can we only show travel blogs on the new travel page? (https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/travel-insurance/)
Thanks a lot, Vivian Vivian Yeung Brand & Campaign Marketing Manager Level 13, 50 Pitt St, Sydney NSW 2000 m 0470 416 709 e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/
15mins

- Flexible, customisable cover and Travel with purpose are now in drafts
- homepage blogs to show only blog posts from oct 1-3

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

It looks like the travel content is now on the homepage live site - can we please remove them until travel launches on 26 Oct?
See "Flexible, customisable cover" and "Travel with purpose" blocks.



Additionally, our team are starting to upload travel blogs to the website this week. Since travel is yet to be launched, can we hide them all from the blog section on homepage? There will be 33 travel blogs uploaded to the site in total. The travel blogs are fine to sit in the blog page but just not homepage.

While on homepage / blog section, can we only show the 3 'latest' blogs that were published on 3rd and 1st October?




Thanks a lot,
Vivian
